title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 830.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 830.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The Lake Champlain drainage basin shall include the
following areas: Lake Champlain and all land and water areas, the natural
surface water drainage from which is directly or indirectly tributary to Lake

Champlain. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
830.2

Adopted

New

York State Register November 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 44, eff. 11/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
